title: Google\Cloud\Run\V2\SecretKeySelector
name: SecretKeySelector
description:
SecretEnvVarSource represents a source for the value of an EnvVar.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.run.v2.SecretKeySelector

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.secret
params.description: Required. The name of the secret in Cloud Secret Manager. Format: {secret_name} if the secret is in the same project. projects/{project}/secrets/{secret_name} if the secret is in a different project.

params.name: data.version
params.description: The Cloud Secret Manager secret version. Can be 'latest' for the latest value or an integer for a specific version.
